Position Overview

* Assume responsibility for the overall Commercial function of Kangopak
* Inter Alia : Finance, Commercial, Processing of Customer Orders, and Logistics
* Kangopak Management Representative in respect of BRCGS

Essential Job Functions

* Responsible for entire Kangopak Finance function including adherence to all statutory requirements
* Overall responsibility for Kangopak Logistics function
* Custodian of Kangopak statistical data
* Management of the compliance and requirements of BRCGS (Product Safety and Quality Management System)

Requirements

* Finance Degree
* Minimum of 10 yearsâ€™ experience in office/manufacturing environment.

Other Skills/Abilities

* Self-starter with Initiative
* Excellent interpersonal and organisational skills
* Exposure to a Quality Management System
* Computer literacy
* Proficient in PASTEL
